Text:
I really appreciate the insane amount of work you're (or are you a team?) putting into assembling all these books.  I especially like that you're separately posting and clearly labeling your non-English and Adult posts.

Is it also possible for you to segregate the COVER ONLY files into a post of their own?

thanks...
If you just want the covers only, when you open in utorrent, sort by size, the covers will usually be all the files less than 1.5mb
